Add a `UserInfo`/profile model and integrate social OAuth for signups.

Tasks:
- Implement `UserInfo` model for extended profile data (social links, resume, bio)
- Add endpoints/UI to view/edit profiles
- Integrate social login (e.g., OAuth via GitHub/Google) or document recommended approach for FastAPI
- Add tests for profile CRUD and OAuth flows

Related issue: https://github.com/Atostrain445/skills-integrate-mcp-with-copilot/issues/13
